https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hVuKIPl0CuDxwNz08uMVZp9GeiV.jpg When best friends, Jack and Scottie, get a once in a lifetime shot at hidden loot, they take off on a cross-country adventure turned crime spree. With a whiny accidental hostage in tow, and a deranged bounty huntress and Johnny Law hot on their trail, it's going to be a race to the bullet-riddled finish. Easy Does It
